column6: Notes
Flight arrives 18:00; complete customs and pick up rental car by around 19:30.
1.5 hour drive from Bergamo to Morcote; enjoy twilight drive along Lake Lugano; check into accommodation.
Settle into accommodation and enjoy a light meal at a lakeside restaurant or hotel.
Enjoy relaxed morning along promenade
Boat from Morcote or bus #431 to Lugano (approx 30 min)

Choose a bistro in Lugano center
Travel from Lugano to Gandria (30 min)

column5: Walk Olive Trail to Gandria village
column6: Walk scenic path and explore Gandria's narrow streets
Return to Morcote and enjoy free time in the most beautiful village in Switzerland 2016
Dine at local restaurant; optional “Swing the World” swing above church World

column5: Visit Carona village and Parco San Grato
column6: Drive to Carona; explore botanical gardens famous for rhododendrons and azaleas

column5: Funicular to Monte San Salvatore for 360° views
column6: Take funicular from Ciona to summit; enjoy panorama; optional short hike
Outdoor miniature park displaying Swiss landmarks
Relax, swim, paddle board or explore neighbouring villages
Wander through Scherrer Park with subtropical plants and sculptures before departure
Check out and depart for Pallanza
Approx 2.5 hr; enjoy scenic border crossing
Walk along elegant promenade with views of Borromean Islands Poi.html#:~:text=situation on the Borromean Gulf of the municipality of Verbania
Visit Church of San Leonardo, 19th‑century town hall with pink granite pillars, and Villa Giulia
Visit gardens created by Marquis Silvio and Sophia with themed gardens like Joy, Sadness and Hours; appointments required
Take ferry from Pallanza to Isola Bella
Visit Baroque palace and terraced gardens with white peacocks
Short ferry ride between islands (15 min)
Wander narrow lanes, shops and have lunch in seafood restaurant
Ferry ride to largest island (15 min)
Explore exotic plants and 16th‑century palace
Return ferry to mainland (30 min)
Relax after island hopping; explore Pallanza or rest at accommodation

column5: Hike or bike along lakeside to Fondotoce or Intra

column6: Walk 7 km of paths through gardens created by Captain Neil McEacharn in 1931; open 8:30‑18:30
Direct drive to Lake Orta (~45 min)
Stroll medieval streets and lakefront promenade
Ferry to island and visit basilica and monastery; island of silence and meditation
Lakeside restaurant lunch
UNESCO World Heritage site with 20 chapels depicting St. Francis; woodland walk with lake views
Return to accommodation
Medieval castle on Lake Maggiore with frescoes and doll museum; great lake views

column5: Drive to Bergamo with lunch stop
column6: 3.5 hour drive via A8/A4; stop for lunch at roadside restaurant or town along the way
Pick up daughters at 18:00; explore Bergamo Città Alta if time permits
1.5 hour drive to Lake Iseo with daughters
Check into accommodation; reunite with daughters
Celebrate reunion with lakeside dinner
Breakfast at accommodation with lake view.

column5: Ferry to Monte Isola & island exploration
column6: Ferries every ~20 min; explore car-free island, hike to Sanctuary of Madonna della Ceriola, rent bikes; crossing ~5 min
Return from Monte Isola and relax at accommodation; shower and rest
Visit Big Bench #73 on the way to Iseo

column5: Visit Iseo town and Franciacorta wine region
column6: Evening stroll around Iseo town and brief Franciacorta visit
Dinner at lakeside restaurant in Iseo with daughters
Drive back to Sale Marasino after dinner
Breakfast at accommodation with lake view.
30 minute drive around Lake Iseo to Lovere
Visit medieval lakeside town; walk historic center and lakefront promenade; one of Italy's most beautiful villages
Explore Costa Volpino and Rogno; traditional Lake Iseo villages with mountain views
Lakeside lunch with views of Lake Iseo
Return drive around lake
Rest at accommodation and pack for Dolomites trip
Final dinner at Sale Marasino with daughters before Dolomites trip
Enjoy breakfast with lake views; pack luggage and check out of accommodation.

column5: Drive to Bergamo Airport; drop-off daughter
column6: Allow ~4 hr for the scenic drive via autostrada; drop your daughter for her 13:00 flight. Consider coffee break en route.

column5: Drive to Selva di Val Gardena
column6: Long drive (~4 hr) through the Dolomites; take lunch break along the way.
Check into hotel; relax briefly before evening outing.

column5: Sunset photography at Santa Maddalena and San Giovanni churches
column6: Drive ~45 min to Val di Funes; photograph Odle peaks at sunset (sunset ~19:55); capture golden light on St. Magdalena and St. John churches; return to Selva afterwards.
Enjoy dinner at local restaurant in Selva di Val Gardena after returning from Val di Funes.

column5: Sunrise photography at Alpe di Siusi
column6: Drive to Compaccio before 09:00 vehicle restriction; hike ~1 hr to viewpoint (46.500165 N, 11.653748 E); sunrise ~06:45; capture Sassolungo peaks

column5: Cable car to Seceda & explore ridge
column6: Take Ortisei–Furnes–Seceda cable car (open 8:30–17:30) South Tyrol; enjoy 360° panorama; lunch at hut
Stroll along pedestrian zone and shops

column5: Optional sunset drive to Passo Gardena or Sella
column6: Enjoy golden hour views from mountain pass

column5: Scenic drive via Passo Gardena to Falzarego
column6: Stop at mountain passes for photos; optional Lagazuoi cable car
30-minute walk from Falzarego Pass; photograph Tofane mountain reflections
Complete journey to Cortina d'Ampezzo
Stroll Corso Italia, cafes, Basilica
Drive to lake for golden hour reflections; beautiful mountain backdrop

column5: Hike to Cadini di Misurina viewpoint
column6: Short drive from lake; Sentiero Bonacossa; 3 km round trip; viewpoint coords 46°36'10''N 12°17'46''E (46.6028 N, 12.2961 E); some exposure

column5: Hike Tre Cime loop & sunset photography
column6: Drive to Rifugio Auronzo (10 min from Cadini); hike to Locatelli hut (46.63694 N, 12.31056 E); sunset on peaks ~19:50; plan return with headlamp
Arrive early (before 9:30) to avoid vehicle restrictions; sunrise shoot; walk 3 km loop; boat rental; restrictions: cars banned 9:30–16:00 unless reserved late November or after April

column5: Extended time at Lago di Braies
column6: More time for lake loop walk and boat rental; relaxed morning
1 hour drive from Braies to Cortina
Coffee and relaxed exploration of town
Rest and explore Cortina; optional visit to Olympic venues or local museums
Hike up before chairlift opens; photograph sun rising between rock towers creating sunstar explore WWI open-air museum

column5: Breakfast at Rifugio Scoiattoli or back in Cortina

column6: Drive to Passo Tre Croci; trail 215; 12.1 km round trip; moderate; takes 4–5 hours; lake at 1,925 m; turquoise water; best visited midday to early afternoon trailhead parking at 46°33’23.0″N 12°12’13.6″E

column5: Optional sunset at Falzarego or relax
column6: Option to drive to Passo Falzarego or back to Passo Giau for sunset; or relax and shop in Cortina
